animeTitle: Mortal Bone Demon Slayer: Heavenly Abyss
otherNames: Mortal Bone Slaughter: Heavenly Abyss, Mortal Bone Demon Slayer: Heavenly Abyss, 凡骨屠魔：天渊
synopsis: The discarded young master of the Ye family, Ye Fan, had his dantian destroyed and endured endless humiliation. After experiencing the vicissitudes of life, he obtained false memories and immense power, yet he remained true to his original intentions. Ultimately, he embarked on a journey to save the world.
